data.name: Zorn, the Wanderer
data.notes: "Zorn, the Wanderer" appears only during a rainbow in the suspicious room in Old Ceremonial Hollow, a cave accessed from the east side of Mount M'gando in Cauldros. Once inside take a right at the first junction followed by the next possible left to reach a room with water and an altar. Rainbows occur for a short period after rainy weather, brimstone rain included.
